name: Fiery Dance
description: You dance and flap your wings, sending flames in a 30 foot circle, centered on you. Anyone caught in the blaze must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 2d6 + MOVE fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, double the MOVE modifier when adding damage
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
